{"step_by_step_thinking": "To determine which of the following is not transmitted by lice, we need to refer to the relevant documents. Document [1] states that body lice are vectors of three bacteria: Rickettsia prowazekii (causes epidemic typhus), Bartonella quintana (causes trench fever), and Borrelia recurrentis (causes relapsing fever). Therefore, we can conclude that lice do not transmit Q fever. ", "answer_choice": "A"}
